text: Zuzana Števulová (born 1983) is a Slovakia lawyer and lecturer. She helps migrants. She was given an International Women of Courage Award. ==Life== Števulová was born in Slovakia in 1983. She is lecturer at the University of Trnava.Zuzana Stevulova, migrationonline.cz, Retrieved 15 July 2016 She had campaigned for migrants arriving in Europe, She was the first Slovak to be given an International Women of Courage Award in Washington DC.Zuzana Števulová receives International Women of Courage Award , Human Rights League of Slovakia, Retrieved 15 July 2016 She has supported the rights of the migrants in her country. == Other websites == * 2016 International Women of Courage Awards, U.S. State Department photostream on Flickr *Secretary's International Women of Courage Award (U.S. Department of State) ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Slovak lawyers Category:Women who received the International Women of Courage Award Category:Human rights activists
title: Zuzana Stevulova
